A

addTeam(Team) - Method in class Race
Add a new Team if possible (also check validity of the team).
age - Variable in class RacePerson
Age of the person

C

calculateSkill() - Method in class CrewMember
Calculate skill as skill = (CrewMember.experience*100/age)
calculateSkill() - Method in class Driver
Calculate skill as skill = (Driver.points*100)/Driver.numRacesParticipated
calculateSkill() - Method in class RacePerson
Calculate skill of person according to requirements specified in derived class
calculateTeamSkill() - Method in class Team
Calculate teamSkill as teamSkill = (5*driver's Skill + 2*crew member's Skill)
cost - Variable in class Vehicle
Cost of the vehicle
CrewMember - Class in <Unnamed>
 
CrewMember(String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class CrewMember
Initialize the variables.
Skill should be calculated and assigned in the constructor (see CrewMember.calculateSkill()).
crewMember - Variable in class Team
An object of class CrewMember

E

experience - Variable in class CrewMember
Experience of the crew member.

F

findWinner() - Method in class Race
Winner is calculated as the Team with most amount of skill.
FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_COST - Static variable in class FourWheeler
Maximum cost of any four wheeler which will be allowed in the race.
Set to 45.
FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_LENGTH - Static variable in class FourWheeler
Maximum length of any four wheeler which will be allowed in the race.
Set to 20.
FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_WIDTH - Static variable in class FourWheeler
Maximum width of any four wheeler which will be allowed in the race.
Set to 10.
FourWheeler - Class in <Unnamed>
 
FourWheeler(String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class FourWheeler
Initialize numWheels to 4 and all the others from given arguments

G

getDriver() - Method in class Team
 
getInfo() - Method in class CrewMember
Return String in 2 lines
1st line - result of toString() of base class.
2nd line - 'Experience : CrewMember.experience'
(without quotes)
getInfo() - Method in class Driver
Return a String of 3 lines.
1st line - result of toString() of base class.
2nd line - 'Points : Driver.points'.
3rd line - 'No.
getInfo() - Method in class FourWheeler
Return String in 2 lines
1st line - result of toString() of base class.
2nd line - 'Wheels : numWheels'
(without quotes)
getInfo() - Method in class RacePerson
 
getInfo() - Method in class TwoWheeler
Return String in 2 lines
1st line - result of toString() of base class.
2nd line - 'Wheels : numWheels'
(without quotes)

I

ID - Variable in class RacePerson

L

length - Variable in class Vehicle
Length of the vehicle

M

MAX_RACES - Static variable in class Driver
Maximum number of races the driver can participate in.
Set to 20.
MAX_TEAMS - Static variable in class Race
Maximum number of teams that can take part in a race.
Set to 10.
MIN_AGE - Static variable in class CrewMember
Minimum age required to be eligible for the race.
Set to 20.
MIN_AGE - Static variable in class Driver
Minimum age required to be eligible for the race.
Set to 20.
MIN_EXPERIENCE - Static variable in class CrewMember
Minimum experience required to participate.
Set to 2.
MIN_POINTS - Static variable in class Driver
Minimum points required to participate.
Set to 5.

N

name - Variable in class RacePerson

name - Variable in class Vehicle

numRacesParticipated - Variable in class Driver

numTeams - Variable in class Race
Number of teams participating in the race
numWheels - Variable in class Vehicle

P

TWO_WHEELER_MAX_COST - Static variable in class TwoWheeler
Maximum cost of any two wheeler which will be allowed in the race.
Set to 15.

Set to 10.

Maximum width of any two wheeler which will be allowed in the race.
Set to 3.

V

vehicle - Variable in class Team
An object of class Vehicle.
Vehicle - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Vehicle(String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class Vehicle
Initializes length,width,cost from arguments.
verifyValidity() - Method in class CrewMember
Verify the validity of the Crew Member.
A crew member is valid if his age and experience are greater than or equal to MIN_AGE and MIN_POINTS respectively.
verifyValidity() - Method in class Driver
Verify the validity of the driver.
A driver is valid if his age and points are greater than or equal to MIN_AGE and MIN_POINTS respectively
and he has participated in less than MAX_RACES.
verifyValidity() - Method in class FourWheeler
Verify the validity of the Four Wheeler
A Four Wheeler is valid if its length and width are less than or equal to FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_LENGTH and FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_WIDTH respectively
and its cost is less than or equal to FOUR_WHEELER_MAX_COST
verifyValidity() - Method in class RacePerson
Abstract function verifyValidity() implemented according to requirements of derived class
verifyValidity(String) - Method in class Team
To check validity of team
verifyValidity() - Method in class TwoWheeler
Verify the validity of the Two Wheeler
A Two Wheeler is valid if its length and width are less than or equal to TWO_WHEELER_MAX_LENGTH and TWO_WHEELER_MAX_WIDTH respectively
and its cost is less than or equal to TWO_WHEELER_MAX_COST
verifyValidity() - Method in class Vehicle
Abstract function verifyValidity() implemented according to requirements of derived class

W

width - Variable in class Vehicle
Width of the vehicle
